definition: a building used as a factory/factory (building)/CL:座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
"cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: Participate facility and equipment upgrades to improve plant productivity and throughput.
sentences.chinese: 参与升级厂房设施与设备以提高产率产量。

sentences.english: in the cork workshop, the workers fork the pork.
sentences.chinese: 在栓皮厂房，工许多人用叉子叉猪肉。

sentences.english: Other factories have spread like wild flowers among what were once rice fields and fish farms.
sentences.chinese: 大量的厂房像野花一样盛开在原来的稻田和渔场之上。

sentences.english: The standard premise covers 4800 square meters in total.
sentences.chinese: 我公司拥有标准厂房4800平方米。

sentences.english: Offer standard workshop for foreign-invested project.
sentences.chinese: 为外商投资项目提供标准厂房。

sentences.english: Factory buildings spread out over the hillside.
From time to time they pull down much-loved old buildings to make room for new plants.
sentences.chinese: 他们常常毁掉一些人们喜爱的老建筑物来盖新厂房。

sentences.english: The 706 Factory House is a modern version of the ancient Roman city-state.
sentences.chinese: 诺大的七零六厂房，如同现代版的古罗马城邦。

sentences.english: The powerhouse is designed to be of shaft and semi-underground type and the substation of open type.
sentences.chinese: 厂房采用竖井半地下式布置，开敞式变电站。

sentences.english: In 1, the top of the plant room in direct sunlight, poor ventilation.
sentences.chinese: 机房在厂房的最顶层阳光直照，通风不良。

sentences.english: On Thursday morning, helicopters operated by Japan's self-defense forces made four passes over the plant's No. 3 reactor to dump water.
sentences.chinese: 周四早上，日本自卫队的直升机四次对3号厂房注水。

sentences.english: Death toll rises to 6 in workshop collapse.
sentences.chinese: 江苏南通兴建厂房倒塌，死亡人数上升至6人。

sentences.english: No leakage, sanitary and suit to clean workshop.
sentences.chinese: 无泄漏现象，清洁卫生，适合于洁净厂房。

sentences.english: Cracks have appeared on the dam’s surface and workshops at the site have collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 大坝的表面有裂痕，而且那个地方的厂房已经坍塌。

sentences.english: Jiangya underground powerhouse has 33 chambers in different size.
sentences.chinese: 江垭电站地下厂房洞室群共有大小洞室33个。

sentences.english: Factory area of 18,00 square meters, nearly 200 workers.
sentences.chinese: 公司厂房面积达18，00平方米，职工近200人。

definition: a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
temporary housing built with wooden planks or other makeshift materials
Pingfang district of Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1] in Heilongjiang
